text: Ceratozamia euryphyllidia is a species of plant in the family Zamiaceae. It is found in Guatemala and in the Mexican state of Oaxaca and Veracruz (in the isthmus of Tehuantepec region). It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== euryphyllidia Category:Flora of Guatemala Category:Flora of Oaxaca Category:Flora of Veracruz Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Endangered biota of Mexico Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ceratozamia euryphyllidia
